title: Ticket #1525: windows condor_submit run_as_owner=False
description:
when running condor_submit with run_as_owner=FALSE

you receive this error: ERROR: run_as_owner requires a valid CREDD_HOST configuration macro

which doesn't make much sense b/c it should only need it if run_as_owner=TRUE.

It's a simple logic fix.
check_ins: 2010-Jul-22 14:48   Check-in [18617]: Ticket #1525: windows condor_submit run_as_owner=False Solution: only check for CREDD_HOST when run_as_owner=TRUE (By Timothy St. Clair )
creator: tstclair
